items.title: Fool me once: the magical origin of the word hoax
items.description: Frauds, swindles, cons, scams, and deceptions are collectively known as hoaxes. But there's more than meets the eye.

items.title: Oktoberfest opening delayed in Munich after fatal fire and bomb threat

items.title: Bomb threat shuts Oktoberfest in Munich after explosion, fire in home
items.description: Authorities in Munich say a bomb threat has shut down Germany's famed Oktoberfest after an explosion and deadly fire in a home nearby.
